name: MOGED
description:
Practice your Parkour skills in the middle of the street up to the international space station in this cartoony fps runner !

Run, wall run, slide, hike, across multiple environments !

This game is a school project, developed in 6 month in a team of 3 !

CONTROLS :

MOVE : ZQSD

JUMP : SPACEBAR

RUN : LEFT SHIFT

CROUCH/SLIDE : LEFT CTRL
